author: CTPPS
body:
This is a cumulative backport of #28492, #28615 and #28621.

This PR does not change the results of default proton reconstruction. The plot below compares reco proton kinematic distributions from CMSSW_10_6_8 (blue) and this PR (red dashed). For xi histograms the perfect overlap is obvious. The apparent difference in the other histograms to due to a different binning.

![make_cmp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/71994790-acb09600-3239-11ea-9de4-a0ab06b0ab3a.png)

This PR provides the same "direct" simulation as in master. The plot below compares a simulated x distribution from master (blue) and this PR (red dashed) - there is perfect overlap.

![x_dist_cmp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/72001008-c5727900-3244-11ea-96cc-acd94fada954.png)
title: PPS: backport of #28492, #28615 and #28621
